name: slite
title: Slite
setup_instructions: To connect Slite, you need an API key from your Slite workspace.

fields.name: api_key
fields.label: API Key
fields.help:
1. Open Slite and click your avatar (bottom left)
2. Go to Settings > Integrations
3. Find 'API access' and click 'Generate new token'
4. Copy the token (you'll only see it once!)
